description:
Clean lines, clean construction. The Lindores Shirt for men delivers both, with room to spare. That's because this wear-me-anywhere shirt is made from hemp—something we like to call our "Wonder Crop" around here.

Why so wonderful you ask? Firstly, it survives on rainwater. It also reduces the need for pesticides, is hungry for CO2, prevents soil erosion, and produces more fiber per acre than trees or cotton. Well, you did ask...
name: Prana Lindores Shirt - Slim - Mens
